title_full: FSISEC01-BP01 Consider and leverage a Cloud Center of Excellence (CCoE)
title: Consider and leverage a Cloud Center of Excellence (CCoE)
description: CCoEs are known drivers of change across the enterprise and the focal point for cloud transformation. They help create and manage governance and security policies in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
outcome: Establish a Cloud Center of Excellence that acts as the focal point for cloud transformation and security governance.

title_full: FSISEC01-BP02 Use cloud-native services for management and governance
title: Use cloud-native services for management and governance
description: Leverage AWS Management and Governance native services to provision resources and applications while meeting policies and operating for business agility and governance control.
outcome: Achieve balance between innovation and control using cloud-native management and governance services.

title_full: FSISEC02-BP01 Automate your compliance management
title: Automate your compliance management
description: Use AWS Config and its proactive mode to automate and scale compliance management, helping save time and remove the risk of human error.
outcome: Achieve automated, scalable compliance management with reduced risk of human error.

title_full: FSISEC02-BP02 Use ready-to-deploy templates for standards and best practices
title: Use ready-to-deploy templates for standards and best practices
description: Use managed rules, AWS Config Conformance Packs, and AWS Security Hub CSPM standards to measure security levels in cloud environments and align with financial services industry standards.
outcome: Quickly assess and enforce compliance with industry standards and regulatory requirements.

title_full: FSISEC03-BP01 Review IAM policies and permissions
title: Review IAM policies and permissions
description: Perform periodic reviews of IAM roles using last accessed information and delete roles that are not in use to maintain tight controls around identity management.
outcome: Maintain least privilege access through regular review and cleanup of unused IAM roles.

title_full: FSISEC03-BP02 Mitigate privilege escalation
title: Mitigate privilege escalation
description: Use service control policies (SCPs) to block users except IAM administrators from performing administrative IAM actions, and use IAM permissions boundaries for safe delegation.
outcome: Prevent unauthorized privilege escalation while enabling safe delegation of IAM permissions management.

title_full: FSISEC03-BP03 Monitor unauthorized activity in your AWS accounts
title: Monitor unauthorized activity in your AWS accounts
description: Turn on AWS CloudTrail, store logs centrally, use Amazon GuardDuty for threat detection, and monitor for privilege escalation and other IAM-related security events.
outcome: Detect and respond to unauthorized activity and potential privilege escalation attempts.

title_full: FSISEC04-BP01 Implement the principle of separation of duties
title: Implement the principle of separation of duties
description: Distribute system administration activities so no one administrator can hide their activities or control an entire system. Ensure requestor and approver cannot be the same person for critical tasks.
outcome: Mitigate risk on critical tasks by ensuring different people perform and approve tasks.

title_full: FSISEC04-BP02 Use AWS Config to view historical IAM configuration and changes over time
title: Use AWS Config to view historical IAM configuration and changes over time
description: Use AWS Config to view the IAM policy that was assigned to users, groups, or roles at any time to determine historical permissions.
outcome: Maintain audit trail of IAM permissions changes for compliance and investigation purposes.

title_full: FSISEC04-BP03 Set up alerts for IAM configuration changes and perform audits
title: Set up alerts for IAM configuration changes and perform audits
description: Set up alerts to notify on IAM configuration changes including when users are created or when conflicting permissions are added, using CloudTrail, CloudWatch, and SNS.
outcome: Receive real-time notifications of IAM changes to monitor activities by users with elevated privileges.

title_full: FSISEC05-BP01 Track configuration changes
title: Track configuration changes
description: Use AWS Config to audit and evaluate configuration settings of AWS resources, continually track changes, and check compliance with desired state using managed rules.
outcome: Establish security baseline and identify configuration deviations as they happen.

title_full: FSISEC05-BP02 Detect unusual and unauthorized activity early
title: Detect unusual and unauthorized activity early
description: Use Amazon GuardDuty, AWS Security Hub CSPM, CloudTrail Insights, and malware protection to continually monitor for unauthorized behavior and detect threats early.
outcome: Detect unauthorized activity and security threats early to enable rapid response.

title_full: FSISEC06-BP01 Automate remediation of common vulnerabilities and exposures (CVEs)
title: Automate remediation of common vulnerabilities and exposures (CVEs)
description: Use Amazon Inspector to automatically scan servers in production and implement automatic remediation of security vulnerabilities based on findings.
outcome: Automatically identify and remediate known security vulnerabilities without manual intervention.

title_full: FSISEC06-BP02 Perform static analysis on all code deploys
title: Perform static analysis on all code deploys
description: Integrate static code analysis within the deployment pipeline to learn about security vulnerabilities prior to provisioning AWS resources.
outcome: Identify security vulnerabilities before deployment to reduce costs and risks.

title_full: FSISEC06-BP03 Conduct regular penetration testing
title: Conduct regular penetration testing
description: Run penetration testing regularly after every major release that involves significant re-architecture changes to identify new vulnerabilities.
outcome: Identify security vulnerabilities through simulated attacks after architectural changes.

title_full: FSISEC06-BP04 Deploy web application firewalls
title: Deploy web application firewalls
description: Use AWS WAF with managed rule sets from AWS Marketplace to protect against application vulnerabilities such as OWASP Top 10, bots, and emerging CVEs.
outcome: Protect web applications from common vulnerabilities with automatically updated managed rules.

title_full: FSISEC07-BP01 Monitor instance traffic
title: Monitor instance traffic
description: Use custom metrics and CloudWatch to monitor EC2 instance traffic, create profiles for expected behavior, and generate alarms when deviations are detected.
outcome: Detect anomalous network behavior and potential security threats through traffic monitoring.

title_full: FSISEC07-BP02 Use VPC Traffic Mirroring
title: Use VPC Traffic Mirroring
description: Use VPC Traffic Mirroring to copy network traffic from elastic network interfaces and forward to security and monitoring appliances for inspection and threat monitoring.
outcome: Enable deep packet inspection and threat monitoring without installing agents on instances.

title_full: FSISEC07-BP03 Use immutable infrastructure with no human access
title: Use immutable infrastructure with no human access
description: Adopt immutable infrastructure practices where no updates, security patches, or configuration changes happen in place. Deploy new versions of architecture instead.
outcome: Achieve consistent, reliable, and predictable infrastructure that is easier to audit and secure.

title_full: FSISEC07-BP04 Allow interactive access for emergencies only
title: Allow interactive access for emergencies only
description: Tightly control and monitor interactive access to instances. Use break-glass procedures for emergencies only with special audit trails and AWS Systems Manager Session Manager.
outcome: Minimize security risks from interactive access while maintaining emergency response capabilities.

title_full: FSISEC08-BP01 Implement a multi-account strategy
title: Implement a multi-account strategy
description: Use multiple AWS accounts to isolate production workloads from non-production environments, leveraging AWS Organizations and AWS Control Tower for governance.
outcome: Achieve strong isolation between SDLC environments with centralized governance and controls.

title_full: FSISEC08-BP02 Enforce network isolation
title: Enforce network isolation
description: Enforce clear separation of resources between production and non-production environments using AWS PrivateLink, Transit Gateways, and Zero Trust architectures.
outcome: Implement network-level isolation and microsegmentation to meet regulatory requirements.

title_full: FSISEC09-BP01 Consider compliance obligations regarding location of cryptographic keys
title: Consider compliance obligations regarding location of cryptographic keys
description: Evaluate different key types in AWS KMS and consider custom key stores with AWS CloudHSM or external key stores for specific compliance obligations.
outcome: Meet compliance requirements for cryptographic key management and data sovereignty.

title_full: FSISEC10-BP01 Prevent modifications and deletions of logs and data
title: Prevent modifications and deletions of logs and data
description: Use Amazon S3 Object Lock and FSx for NetApp ONTAP SnapLock to store objects and files using a WORM model, meeting regulatory requirements for non-erasable formats.
outcome: Meet regulatory requirements for immutable data storage and prevent unauthorized modifications.

title_full: FSISEC10-BP02 Limit and monitor key deletes
title: Limit and monitor key deletes
description: Restrict key deletion to key administrators only, implement safety windows, and set up alarms to detect use of keys pending deletion.
outcome: Prevent accidental or malicious deletion of encryption keys that would make data unrecoverable.

title_full: FSISEC11-BP01 Prevent malware infiltration by securing compute resources
title: Prevent malware infiltration by securing compute resources
description: Enable malware protection in Amazon GuardDuty to automatically scan EBS volumes attached to EC2 instances or container workloads for malware detection.
outcome: Detect malware that may be the source of ransomware incidents through agentless scanning.

title_full: FSISEC11-BP02 Prevent threats from accessing your data stores
title: Prevent threats from accessing your data stores
description: Scope access to data based on minimum privileges, implement effective data classification, and use network isolation to limit the blast radius of exploits.
outcome: Prevent unauthorized access to data stores and limit impact if systems are compromised.

title_full: FSISEC11-BP03 Use frequent backups to recover from a threat
title: Use frequent backups to recover from a threat
description: Incorporate short-lived anti-ransomware backups, use AWS Backup with Vault Lock for WORM protection, and take frequent snapshots of data stores.
outcome: Enable quick recovery from ransomware attacks through frequent, immutable backups.

title_full: FSISEC12-BP01 Regularly review your incident response plan for regulatory compliance
title: Regularly review your incident response plan for regulatory compliance
description: Develop playbooks for incident response, understand regional regulatory requirements, and establish processes to review and update playbooks regularly.
outcome: Maintain incident response plans that meet evolving regulatory requirements across regions.
